item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Don’t forget to add

[tt]c.getPA().requestUpdates();[/tt]

item.title: Help fixing a command in [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

[quote=“AtomicInt_, post:2, topic:431544”][code=java]
if (playerCommand.startsWith(“ascend”)) {
for (int i = 0; i < c.playerLevel.length; i++) {
if (i == 3) {
c.playerLevel[i] = 10;
} else {
c.playerLevel[i] = 1;
}
}

for (int i = 0; i < c.playerXP.length; i++) {
    if (i == 3) {
	c.playerXP[i] = 1300;
    } else {
	c.playerXP[i] = 0;
    }
}
}

[/code][/quote]

Thanks so much, imma test it out asap!

Read full topic

	    }
	}

	    if (i == 3) {
		c.playerXP[i] = 1300;
	    } else {
		c.playerXP[i] = 0;
	    }

item.title: Help fixing a command in [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Doobage Doobage
item.description:
@Doobage wrote:

I’m trying to make a command that will let you reset your account back to level 3 again.

here is what i have:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("ascend")) { c.sendMessage("You have reset your Attack"); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(1); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(0); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(1); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(1); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(2); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(2); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(3); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(3); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(4); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(4); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(5); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(5); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(6); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(6); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(7); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(7); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(8); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(8); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(9); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(9); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(10); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(10); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(11); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(11); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(12); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(12); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(13); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(13); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(14); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(14); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(15); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(15); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(16); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(16); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(17); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(17); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(18); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(18); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(19); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(19); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(20); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(20); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(21); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(21); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(22); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(22); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(23); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(23); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(24); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(24); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(25); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(25); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(26); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(26); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(27); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(27); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(28); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(28); c.playerXP[0] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(29); c.playerLevel[1] = c.getPA().getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[1]); c.getPA().refreshSkill(29); }

It resets skills, but not all of them, and they dont go to level 1 either. or 10 for hp

[Also, i tried making it so you had to have 99 in every stat to do this, and u will get all party hats if you did]

if that is possible, to do it would be highly appreciated if someone can help me fix it, thanks!
